metadata.title: CVE-2022-2228 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Information exposure in GitLab EE affecting all versions from 12.0 prior to14.10.5, 15.0 prior to 15.0.4, and 15.1 prior to 15.1.1 allows an attackerwith the appropriate access tokens to obtain CI variables in a group withusing IP-based access restrictions even if the GitLab Runner is callingfrom outside the allowed IP range

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
